page.title: 10Winter Sports (Skiing)
page.content:
Near Grantown we have the {Cairngorm}and the{Lecht Ski Centres. The Lecht is good for{beginners}and the more{advanced}skiers prefer the more demanding slopes of the Cairngorms. Skis can be hired from the local Sports shop
